api_list.api_description: Get list of all available resources for a specified endpoint in the Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition SRD API.

required_parameters.name: endpoint
required_parameters.description: The endpoint to query for available resources.

api_list.api_description: Returns whether a given number is even.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number you want to check.

query: Can you list all the classes available in Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition and also tell me if the number 4 is even?

api_list.api_description: Get an ability score by index in the Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition SRD API.

required_parameters.name: index
required_parameters.description: The index of the ability score to get.

api_list.api_description: Returns whether a given number is even.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number you want to check.

query: I need information about the ability score 'cha' in Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition. Additionally, can you confirm if 5 is an even number?
